Teste de Ljung-Box

LB  <- NULL
for (lag in 1:30)
{
  LB[lag] <- Box.test(resid(fit$fit), lag = lag, type='Ljung-Box')$p.value
}
data.frame(p.values = LB)


data.frame(p.values = LB)
    p.values
1  0.5640076
2  0.8466558
3  0.9460067
4  0.9716608
5  0.9477000
6  0.6735138
7  0.7359979
8  0.7950385
9  0.7989553
10 0.8546071
11 0.8489813
12 0.8094971
13 0.6427907
14 0.6927771
15 0.7505509
16 0.6899986
17 0.7397832
18 0.4543890
